block.name: Event Queue
block.import: import es; from gruel import pmt;
block.doc:
Ignore the value field....
The Early Behavior setting determines what happens when an event arrives before the available buffer.
BALK - throws an assertion and exits when this happens useful for debugging if you have critical timing that can not be missed
ASAP - schedules events at the earliest possible next time useful for opportunistic best-effort timing
